mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (name, category, unit_price, safety_stock, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{name}, #{category}, #{unitPrice}, #{safetyStock}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET name = #{name}, category = #{category}, unit_price = #{unitPrice}, safety_stock = #{safetyStock}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, category, unit_price, safety_stock, created_at, updated_at FROM product
